# LLM-Based Reasoning Module

## 1. Configuration
* Install dependency:
pip install openai
* Set OpenAI API key:
export OPENAI_API_KEY="your_api_key"

## 2. Required Input
Provide the following files:
* -"observation.json" (generated by the VLM module)
* -"procedure.json" (programmatic experimental goal G)
* -"memory.json" (procedural memory; can be empty on first run)

## 3. Output
The module generates "action.json" containing the next executable robot action.
